articles.title: First Citizens in talks to acquire Silicon Valley Bank, Bloomberg reports - Reuters
articles.description: First Citizens BancShares Inc (FCNCA.O) is evaluating an offer for Silicon Valley Bank (SIVB.O), Bloomberg News
articles.content:
March 18 (Reuters) - First Citizens BancShares Inc (FCNCA.O) is evaluating an offer for Silicon Valley Bank (SIVB.O), Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.
